Title: Easy Years
Writer: Sergio Amidei (screenplay), Vitaliano Brancati (screenplay), Vitaliano Brancati (story), Vincenzo Talarico (screenplay), Luigi Zampa (screenplay)
Actors: Nino Taranto, Alda Mangini, Gino Buzzanca, Clelia Matania
Plot: A Sicilian professor who moves to Rome gets lost in the maze of Roman ministries and gives in to corruption.
